name: gemini
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a northern constellation (= a group of stars) said to represent twins (= two brothers or sisters born together): As darkness falls, Gemini is just rising in the northeast.
[ C or U ] the third sign of the zodiac, relating to the period from 23 May to 21 June, represented by twins (= two brothers or sisters born together), or a person born during this period: It was interesting to discover that the sales department contained a high proportion of those born under the sign of Gemini. My mother is a talkative, sociable Gemini.
More examplesFewer examplesGeminid meteors appear to radiate from the constellation Gemini, the Twins.Saturn lies in Gemini south of the two bright stars Castor and Pollux.He was a Gemini, a man with two faces.Harvey is the same sign as me: Gemini.

the third sign of the zodiac, covering the period May 21 to June 21 and represented by twins, or a person born during this period
